detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Bitnext (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#542-605) has payable functions:
	 - Bitnext.constructor(string,string,uint8,uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#556-564)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Bitnext](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#L542-L605) has payable functions:
	 - [Bitnext.constructor(string,string,uint8,uint256,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#L556-L564)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#340-347) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#344)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#345)
